page_analysis.text_content:
Detached garages/carports site planning

• Detached garages and carports may be located in the rear or interior side yard if at least 75' from the front lot line and at least 20' from the street-side lot line.
• Additionally, on lots less than 95' deep, they may be located in rear or interior side yards if placed in rear half of the lot.
• Garages and carports that take advantage of this setback exception are subject to a stricter daylight plane. See Figs 25-26 p. 32.

Fig 34 Examples of site planning solutions for detached garages/carports

Garages at the lot line must comply with Uniform Building Code (UBC) requirements for fire-rated walls & roof materials.

Carports with open sides must be at least 3' from any lot line.

Note: Uncovered spaces must be located beyond the required front-yard and beyond the first 10' of the street-side yard.

Note: In all the examples on this page, a 1-car garage could be substituted for a 2-car garage because there is room for uncovered parking in the driveway.

A 2-car garage w/uncovered spaces in driveway (tandem OK)
B 2-car carport w/uncovered spaces in driveway (tandem OK)
C 2-car garage w/uncovered spaces in driveway (tandem OK)

visual_elements.description: Fig 34 shows three site planning examples for detached garages/carports labeled A, B, and C. Each example depicts a lot layout with a main dwelling, buildable area, front yard, rear yard, and interior side yards. Example A shows a 2-car garage with rated walls located at the rear yard lot line with uncovered spaces in the driveway (tandem parking allowed). Example B shows a 2-car carport with open sides set at least 3 feet from any lot line, also with uncovered spaces in the driveway (tandem parking allowed). Example C shows a 2-car garage with rated walls located at the corner lot rear yard with uncovered spaces in the driveway (tandem parking allowed). The figure includes measurements such as minimum 75 feet or midpoint for lots less than 95 feet deep, minimum 20 feet from the street-side lot line, and minimum 10 feet for uncovered spaces from the street-side yard. The figure also includes a key explaining symbols for curb, lot line, sidewalk, required setbacks, buildable area, dwelling, parking structure, no-parking area, and uncovered space.
A grey shaded box on the right side of the page containing the note: 'Note: Uncovered spaces must be located beyond the required front-yard and beyond the first 10' of the street-side yard.'

A legend/key located on the right side of the figure explaining line types and shading: solid line for curb, dashed line for lot line, shaded rectangles for sidewalk, dashed areas for required setbacks, light grey for buildable area, dark grey for dwelling, black for parking structure, diagonal hatching for no-parking area, and a car icon for uncovered space.
visual_elements.location: Right side of the figure, middle right

technical_specifications.parameter: Minimum distance from front lot line for detached garages/carports
Minimum distance from street-side lot line for detached garages/carports
Lot depth threshold for rear or interior side yard location exception
Minimum distance carports with open sides must be from any lot line
Minimum distance for uncovered spaces from first part of street-side yard
Minimum distance for uncovered spaces from street-side lot line

additional_notes: Page number 39 in bottom right corner.
No handwritten annotations or stamps detected.
Text and figure are clear and legible.
cross_references: See Figs 25-26 p. 32 for daylight plane requirements.

qualifiers.text: Garages and carports that take advantage of this setback exception are subject to a stricter daylight plane.

conditions.text: Detached garages and carports may be located in the rear or interior side yard if at least 75' from the front lot line and at least 20' from the street-side lot line.
On lots less than 95' deep, garages and carports may be located in rear or interior side yards if placed in rear half of the lot.
Carports with open sides must be at least 3' from any lot line.
Uncovered spaces must be located beyond the required front-yard and beyond the first 10' of the street-side yard.

logical_relationships.expression: Detached garages and carports may be located in the rear or interior side yard if at least 75' from the front lot line AND at least 20' from the street-side lot line.
IF lot depth < 95' THEN garages and carports may be located in rear or interior side yards if placed in rear half of the lot.
Carports with open sides must be at least 3' from any lot line.
Uncovered spaces must be located beyond the required front-yard and beyond the first 10' of the street-side yard.

execution_sequence.action: Verify detached garages/carports location is at least 75 feet from front lot line and 20 feet from street-side lot line.
If lot depth is less than 95 feet, confirm garages/carports are placed in rear half of the lot.
Ensure carports with open sides are at least 3 feet from any lot line.
Confirm uncovered spaces are located beyond the required front-yard and beyond the first 10 feet of the street-side yard.
Apply stricter daylight plane requirements for garages and carports taking advantage of setback exceptions.
